H0.text: who laid the foundation of school of possibilism. Paul Vidal de la Blache

H1.text: who laid the foundation of school of possibilism. Carl Sauer

H2.text: who laid the foundation of school of possibilism. Friedrich Ratzel

H3.text: who laid the foundation of school of possibilism. Strabo

A4.text: The concept of possibilism has been used by historians to evoke the epistemological fuzziness that, according to them, characterized the approach of Vidal's school.

A5.text: Vidal has been linked to the term 'possibilism', which he never used but which summed up conveniently his opposition to the determinism of the sort that was defended by some nineteenth century geographers.
